Contributor: Morgan, R. G., artist.; Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "R.G. Morgan." Date based on America's participation in war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Design for a newspaper and magazine advertisement for a Liberty Loan campaign.  Scale developed by the Liberty Loan Committee to show people the proportion of their subscription according to their income.  The scale is bordered with illustrations of laborers at work.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: Liberty bonds -- United States.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Finance -- United States.; Advertising, Political -- United States.;

Title: What is my share?
